title: Hedy Lamarr | Algiers (1938, Drama) a John Cromwell movie | Colorized

sources.title: Hedy Lamarr | Algiers (1938, Drama) a John Cromwell movie | Colorized
sources.description:
Strange Loves Hiding in the Casbah City of Secrets!
Pepe Le Moko is a notorious thief, who escaped from France. Since his escape, Moko has become a resident and leader of the immense Casbah of Algiers. French officials arrive insisting on Pepeâ€™s capture are met with unfazed local detectives, led by Inspector Slimane, who are biding their time. Meanwhile, Pepe meets the beautiful Gaby, which arouses the jealousy of Ines.

Original title : Algiers
 
Black & White version: https://youtu.be/5KnUlCt658c

This film is available with subtitles in many language options.

Director: John Cromwell
Writers : John Howard Lawson, James M. Cain, Henri La Barthe
Genres: Colorized classics, Drama, Mystery, Romance

Main cast:
Charles Boyer - Pepe le Moko
Hedy Lamarr - Gaby
Sigrid Gurie - Ines
Joseph Calleia - Inspector Slimane
Alan Hale - Grandpere
Gene Lockhart - Regis
Walter Kingsford - Chief Inspector Louvain
Paul Harvey - Commissioner Janvier
Stanley Fields - Carlos
Johnny Downs - Pierrot


00:00 Full movie with subtitles
01:34 Pepe Le Moko hides in the Casbah, evading capture by French authorities.
12:34 Detective Slimane schemes to draw Pepe out while Regis seeks revenge.
22:56 Gaby, a beautiful tourist, catches Pepe's eye, sparking romantic tension.
34:23 Pepe dreams of Paris with Gaby, but she struggles with loyalty and fear.
46:53 Betrayals surface as Regis aids the police, putting Pepe's safety at risk.
56:47 Pepe's plans to escape unravel, leading to tragic confrontations.
1:14:31 A final act of heartbreak unfolds as Pepe's fate is sealed in the Casbah.

Remade into:  Casbah (1948) https://youtu.be/8Ft62Xp_YHg
